title: Amazfit Bip 5 Unity Smart Watch 46mm, 11-Day Battery, Fitness Activity Tracker with 120+ Sports Modes, Heart Rate & Sleep Monitor, Customizable Watch Faces, for Android & iPhone, Charcoal
description: From fitness & outdoor sports to fun apps and games, this Amazfit Bip 5 Unity digital watch is the everyday essential smartwatch for adult men, women and even kids. Along with its super large screen, this fitness tracker is compatible with Apple, Android or other mobile devices. The smart features of the Amazfit Bip 5 Unity are powered by the Zepp OS 3.0, which provides access to a rich ecosystem of more than 70 fun apps and games, and enables the long battery life needed for 24-hour health monitoring. Get active with a huge choice of 120+ sports modes including running, walking, cycling, strength training, yoga, and more.
